tool.name: SAGA.ta_profiles.5
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayGRID False isArrayTABLE False isArrayX False isArrayY False output_data_RESULT $output_data_RESULT name SAGA.ta_profiles.5 GRID $GRID TABLE $TABLE X $X Y $Y prefer $prefer response $response outputType_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.outputType_RESULT transmissionMode_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.transmissionMode_RESULT

param.name: GRID
param.label: Grid
param.help: Grid The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, png, x-ogc-envi

param.name: TABLE
param.label: Input
param.help: Input The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: X
param.label: X
param.help: X The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: Y
param.label: Y
param.help: Y The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_RESULT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_RESULT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: (c) 2004 by Victor Olaya. Creates a profile from coordinates stored in a table
